metadata.title: Mouvement - Ultra Culture Platform
metadata.description: A cultural platform dedicated to documenting and celebrating Ultra culture as an artistic, social, and historical phenomenon.

home.title: Where Passion
home.subtitle: Explore the world of Ultra culture. From legendary tifos to historic rivalries, discover the art, passion, and spirit that defines football's most dedicated supporters.
home.featuredGroupsSubtitle: Discover the most passionate Ultra groups from around the world
home.mapSubtitle: Navigate our interactive map to discover Ultra groups across the globe. Click on any country to explore local groups, their history, and iconic moments.
home.articlesSubtitle: Stories, interviews, and deep dives into Ultra culture
home.joinSubtitle: Be part of a global community dedicated to preserving and celebrating Ultra culture. Share your stories, connect with fellow supporters, and keep the flame alive.

ultras.title: Ultras
ultras.subtitle: Explore Ultra groups from every corner of the globe. Discover their history, traditions, and passion.
ultras.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filters

articles.title: Articles &
articles.subtitle: Deep dives into Ultra culture, interviews with leaders, historical analyses, and exclusive documentaries.

timeline.title: Ultra Culture
timeline.subtitle: A journey through the history of organized supporter movements worldwide.

tifos.title: Art &
tifos.subtitle: The visual masterpieces that transform stadiums into canvases of passion.

chants.title: Chants &
chants.subtitle: The songs and chants that echo through stadiums, passed down through generations.

education.title: Learn About
education.subtitle: New to Ultra culture? Start here to understand the values, traditions, and art forms.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Real stories from Ultra members around the world. Share your experiences.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A cultural platform dedicated to documenting, celebrating, and preserving Ultra culture.
about.passionDesc: We celebrate the raw emotion and dedication that defines Ultra culture worldwide.
about.preservationDesc: Documenting and protecting the traditions, stories, and art forms of supporter movements.
about.unityDesc: Connecting Ultra communities across borders while respecting local identities and rivalries.
about.educationDesc: Sharing knowledge about the history, culture, and significance of the Ultra movement.

contact.title: Get in
contact.subtitle: Have questions, suggestions, or want to collaborate? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.thankYou: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: A cultural platform dedicated to documenting and celebrating Ultra culture as an artistic, social, and historical phenomenon.

auth.signInContinue: Sign in to continue to Mouvement
auth.createAccountSubtitle: Create an account to explore Ultra culture
